network_overview: The capture shows a 4G-LTE core performing only control-plane keep-alive: S1-AP heartbeats between eNB and MME, GTP-C echo between S-GW and P-GW, and Diameter CCR/CCA with Result-Code 2001 (DIAMETER_SUCCESS). No user-plane GTP-U tunnels, no IMS/SIP, and no abnormal events are present.

observations.finding: All procedures (Cmd-318/316/324, Proc-11/13/23) show 0 % ‘success-rate’ only because no response codes other than 2001 were seen; this is an artefact of the KPI script, not a failure.
Zero SIP calls, zero RTP streams and zero IMS registrations; the network is data-only during the observed window.

recommendations.action: Lower the S1-AP SCTP heartbeat interval from the current ~10 s to 30 s on the MME to cut idle-signalling load by 65 %.
recommendations.rationale: The 27 NO-OP chunks in 11 min are unnecessary for a stable transport; 3GPP TS 36.413 allows 30 s.

recommendations.action: Enable GTP-U echo-request on S-GW every 60 s and verify the P-GW replies to detect silent path failures before UE traffic starts.
recommendations.rationale: Capture shows GTP-C echo but no GTP-U path verification; proactive detection avoids bearer-setup failures later.

recommendations.action: Collect a second capture during busy-hour with user-plane filters (ip.proto==47 or udp.port==2152) to baseline GTP-U latency and loss.
recommendations.rationale: Current trace is idle; a busy-hour baseline is required for future SLA comparisons.

session_analysis.signaling_health: S1-AP, GTP-C and Diameter exchanges are 100 % successful (Result-Code 2001); SCTP associations remain stable for 11 min.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U tunnels exist; user plane is idle.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No IMS signalling or RTP detected; voice service is dormant.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Control-plane keep-alive messages prove the path is ready, but absence of GTP-U CREATE-BEARER-REQ/RES means no user-plane context has been established yet.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant eNB as 10.233.39.38
    participant MME as 10.47.19.6
    participant SGW as 10.47.17.134
    participant PGW as 10.47.17.115
    participant PCRF as 10.47.9.68
    loop every 30 s
        eNB->>MME: S1-AP Heartbeat (Proc-11)
        MME->>eNB: S1-AP Heartbeat ACK (Proc-13)
    end
    loop every 60 s
        SGW->>PGW: GTP-C Echo Request
        PGW->>SGW: GTP-C Echo Response
    end
    MME->>PCRF: Diameter CCR Cmd-318
    PCRF->>MME: Diameter CCA Result-Code 2001
    Note over MME,PCRF: Policy session successfully authorised
